name: The Platformer Gun
description:
The Platformer Gun it's a very challenging platformer with puzzle elements!

Korokoro is trapped in some kind of facilty...? It seems to be some kind of test... maybe, she truly doesn't know, But luckily, she has the perfect tool to help her out through this place...The Platformer Gun!

The Platformer gun it's a weapon that can create and shoot two types of platforms, the first one is a solid but stationary square-shaped platform and the second one a gaseous cloud-shaped projectile that serve as a moving platform.

Use Korokoro's Platformer gun to create your way to surpass the obstacles and escape big evil dudes in 80+ levels!

FEATURES:
-80+ levels!
-Bosses!
-Original Soundtrack!
-Password system!
-Korokoro!
-Torótoró!
-Musopuyo!
-Family Problems!
